checkitem.desc: Note 0002392860 missing and solution with SP available
checkitem.compliant: ( ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '700' and not( to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 34 ) ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '701' and not( to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 19 ) ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '702' and not( to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 19 ) ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '710' and not( to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 22 ) ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '711' and not( to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 17 ) ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '730' and not( to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 17 ) ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '731' and not( to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 20 ) ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '740' and not( to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 17 ) ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '750' and not( to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 7 ) ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '751' and not( to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 2 ) ) )
checkitem.noncompliant: ( ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '700' and to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 34 ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '701' and to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 19 ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '702' and to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 19 ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '710' and to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 22 ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '711' and to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 17 ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '730' and to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 17 ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '731' and to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 20 ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '740' and to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 17 ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '750' and to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 7 ) or ( COMPONENT = 'SAP_ABA' and VERSION = '751' and to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 2 ) )

checkitem.desc: Note 0002673959 missing and solution with SP available
checkitem.compliant: ( ( COMPONENT = 'GBX01HR' and VERSION = '600' and not( to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 11 ) ) )
checkitem.noncompliant: ( ( COMPONENT = 'GBX01HR' and VERSION = '600' and to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0') ) < 11 ) )

checkitem.desc: Note 0002673959 missing and applicable using Correction Instruction
checkitem.noncompliant: ( ( COMPONENT = 'GBX01HR' and VERSION = '600' and to_integer( COALESCE(NULLIF(SP,''),'0' ) ) between 2 and 10 ) )
